name: the daily drip
description: A mini news site for Genshin Impact and Honkai: Star Rail. Aimed at compiling game leaks and keeping a calendar list of upcoming characters releases and features.

name: tic tac team
description: A small application for a voip meta-game to be played in Genshin Impact. Generates random grids of characters and plays like a mixture of Connect Four and Tic Tac Toe.

name: beep boop productions
description: Visual playlist for Beep Boop Productions. Used as promotional material for in person dance events.

name: gamma sector
description: Informational hub for an online table-top roleplaying game built for a course assignment. Contains background on setting and culture.
